artist: Artist: Frank Gaard , et al., artists; Publisher: Artpolice, Minneapolis
description: 16 pages; saddle-staped; b/w covers; black-and-white publication with "Artpolice Newsletter" across the top; main image consists of large head of dark-haired woman with banner hanging down in front of her face--same as 2015.100.21a-c but covers are in different order inside and cover is different; at bottom of cover: "Artpolice Gazette Vol. 4, No. 1"; one color card 4 x 6 in. insert; one b/w 8-1/2 x 11 in. photocopy (?) insert
title: Artpolice Newsletter, Vol. 11, No. 2
